question: Does the organization have documented policies and procedures which establish an effective vulnerability monitoring and scanning program to regularly assess and remediate system and network vulnerabilities?
Does the organization analyze the results of security control assessment vulnerability scan reports?
Does the organization have documented policies and procedures which establish an effective malicious code protection program to include if tools are employed and updates are automatically applied?
Does the organization install security-relevant software updates within thirty (30) days of the release of the updates?
Does the organization address the potential impact from vulnerability scans of the information system?
Does the information system have external, internal, and DMZ security zones which are separated by firewalls?
Does the information system encrypt all information in transit?
Does the information system use industry best practice encryption to protect the confidentiality of information at rest?
Are information systems security incidents documented and tracked?
Has the organization implemented security incident handling capabilities which include preparation, detection/analysis, containment, and eradication?
Does the organization use encryption to protect the confidentiality and integrity of information stored on digital media during transport outside of a controlled area?
Does the organization protect information system media until the media is destroyed or sanitized using approved equipment, techniques, and procedures?
Is digital media physically controlled and securely stored within controlled areas?
Does the organization have policies and procedures which establish an effective implementation of controls related to personnel security developed, disseminated, reviewed, and updated?
Upon termination of individual employment, does the organization terminate and/or revoke any user credentials associated with the individual?
Does the organization have documented policies and procedures established for managing personnel security compliance of applicable third-party personnel?
Does the organization have policies and procedures which establish an effective implementation of controls related to physical security developed, disseminated, reviewed, and updated?
Does the organization review physical access logs periodically and upon occurrence of physical security incidents?
Does the organization employ vulnerability scanning to ensure new vulnerabilities are always identified and reported?
Within the organization, are logical access restrictions defined, documented, approved, and enforced when associated changes are made to an information system?
Does the organization document, test and validate changes to the information system before implementing on the operational environment?
Does the organization test backup information at least once a year to verify media reliability and information integrity?
Does the organization recover and reconstitute the information system to a known state after a disruption, compromise, or failure?
Does the organization conduct backups at a frequency consistent with organizational recovery time and recovery point objectives?
Does the organization protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of backup information at all storage locations?
Does the organization require that default information system authenticator content (i.e., default system credentials/passwords) are changed prior to information system installation?

Does the information system support identity federation standards (SAML, OpenID, SPML, WS-Federation, Higgins, Windows CardSpace, MicroID, Liberty Alliance) as a means of authenticating/authorizing users?
Does the organization implement an industry best practice password policy which includes minimum password length, password complexity, password expiration or password age, and password history?
Is Multi-Factor Authentication required for privileged administrative account access to systems?
Is Multi-Factor Authentication required for non-privileged account access to systems?
Does the organization have incident response policies and procedures which are published, reviewed and updated on a regular basis?
